author: jimmygchen
content:
I won't be able to join the eth o'clock call today - but we don't have much PeerDAS updates this week as we've been focusing on Holesky issues. It's been really useful though, got me thinking about handling this kind of scenario in PeerDAS (which seems a bit more difficult)

I've just trigger a lighthouse `ethpandaops/lighthouse:peerdas-devnet-4` image rebuild (the old one is quite old), will try syncing on `peerdas-devnet-5` before rolling it out.

author: agnxsh
content:
I won't be able to join the peerdas breakout as well today, as it clashes with our Nimbus monthly planning call, overall I've been still writing the column syncer with the caveats i discussed before, making some progress there. I still have validator custody left to be totally implemented, let's say it's still only 30% implemented from my side.

That is pretty much from my side, see you all next week!
